verses.verse: <WH7133>"'If his offering is a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings;<WH8002> if he offers<WH7126> it from the herd,<WH1241> whether male<WH2145> or female,<WH5347> he shall offer<WH7126> it without blemish<WH8549> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>

He shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of his offering,<WH7133> and kill<WH7819> it at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and Aaron<WH175>'s sons,<WH1121> the priests<WH3548> shall sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>

He shall offer<WH7126> of the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh;<WH3068> the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the innards,<WH7130> and all the fat<WH2459> that is on the innards,<WH7130>

and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them,<WH3689> which is by the loins, and the cover<WH3508> on the liver,<WH3516> with the kidneys,<WH3629> he shall take away.<WH5493>

Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> shall burn<WH6999> it on the altar<WH4196> on the burnt<WH6999> offering,<WH6086> which is on the wood that is on the fire:<WH784> it is an offering made by fire,<WH784> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

<WH7133>"'If his offering for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> to Yahweh<WH3068> is from the flock;<WH6629> male<WH2145> or female,<WH5347> he shall offer<WH7126> it without blemish.<WH8549>
If he offers<WH7126> a lamb<WH3775> for his offering,<WH7133> then he shall offer<WH7126> it before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068>

and he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of his offering,<WH7133> and kill<WH7819> it before<WH6440> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> shall sprinkle<WH2236> its blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>

He shall offer<WH7126> from the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh;<WH3068> its fat,<WH2459> the entire<WH8549> tail<WH451> fat,<WH5493> he shall take away close<WH5980> to the backbone;<WH6096> and the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the inwards,<WH7130> and all the fat<WH2459> that is on the inwards,<WH7130>

and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them,<WH3689> which is by the loins, and the cover<WH3508> on the liver,<WH3516> with the kidneys,<WH3629> he shall take away.<WH5493>
The priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> it on the altar:<WH4196> it is the food<WH3899> of the offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
<WH7133>"'If his offering is a goat,<WH5795> then he shall offer<WH7126> it before<WH6440> Yahweh:<WH3068>

and he shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on its head,<WH7218> and kill<WH7819> it before<WH6440> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting;<WH4150> and the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> shall sprinkle<WH2236> its blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>

He shall offer<WH7126> from it as his offering,<WH7133> an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh;<WH3068> the fat<WH2459> that covers<WH3680> the innards,<WH7130> and all the fat<WH2459> that is on the innards,<WH7130>

and the two<WH8147> kidneys,<WH3629> and the fat<WH2459> that is on them,<WH3689> which is by the loins, and the cover<WH3508> on the liver,<WH3516> with the kidneys,<WH3629> he shall take away.<WH5493>

The priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> them on the altar:<WH4196> it is the food<WH3899> of the offering made by fire,<WH801> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma;<WH7381> all the fat<WH2459> is Yahweh<WH3068>'s.
<WH5769>"'It shall be a perpetual statute<WH2708> throughout your generations<WH1755> in all your dwellings,<WH4186> that you shall eat<WH398> neither fat<WH2459> nor blood.<WH1818>'"
